subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Billy Horschel shot an eight-under 64 in the final round of the Zurich Classic in Avondale, La., maintaining his composure through a pair of weather delays for his first PGA Tour victory.
snippet: Billy Horschel shot an eight-under 64 in the final round of the Zurich Classic in Avondale, La., maintaining his composure through a pair of weather delays for his first PGA Tour victory.
